description:
It was a Friday when the phone rang in the office of a New Zealand-born accountant named William Gaston Walkley. On the other end of the line was Terry Southwell-Keely, deputy chief of staff at the Sydney Morning Herald, who had just received a cable from Standard Oil of California announcing that oil had been […]

The post How a New York PR Agency Helped the U.S. Oil Industry Conquer Australia appeared first on DeSmog.
title: How a New York PR Agency Helped the U.S. Oil Industry Conquer Australia
